wikipedia_page.main: Professor Edward George Sydney Paige FRS (18 July 1930 – 20 February 2004), known as Ted Paige, was a British physicist and engineer. His main areas of research were semiconductor devices to improve radar, including work on surface acoustic waves, and optical techniques using programmable phase plates.

response: SAW filters are limited to frequencies up to 3 GHz. The filters were developed by Professor Ted Paige and others.
